spells.name: Contagion, Greater
spells.description: Infect a subject with a magical disease.

spells.name: Curse, Major
spells.description: As bestow curse, but harder to remove.

spells.name: Holy Ice
spells.description: Create wall or javelins of frozen holy water.

spells.name: Reprobation
spells.description: Marked target is shunned by your religion.

spells.name: Serenity
spells.description: Peaceful feelings harm those attempting violence.

spells.name: Unholy Ice
spells.description: Create wall or javelins of frozen unholy water.
